content: Change copy 'Generating AI-powered reply...' to 'Regenerating AI reply...'
Remove email icon from student name in left panel TicketList
Redesign right panel - change from unified card to separate cards that fill entire panel height
Remove avatar from Sarah Chen name in conversation messages
In notifications dropdown, remove 'View all notifications' and add 'Clear all' button
Add top navigation to Reports and Knowledge Base pages
Add back navigation to Settings page to return to Tickets
Make 'New Article' button functional, change to 'Upload', remove icon
